name: Kung Fury: Street Rage - Ultimate Edition
storyline: Step into the shoes of Kung Fury, David Hasselhoff and other franchise favorites to kick nazi butts in the epic side-scrolling beat 'em up!
summary: The game is based on the Kung Fury film by Laser Unicorns and has players taking control of five different characters including Kung Fury, Hackerman, and even David Hasselhoff. The Switch edition comes with the Arcade Strikes Back and A Day at the Beach expansions, with the latter piece of content containing an entirely additional experience featuring a 2-player co-op mode, all-new levels, and boss battles.
